sentences: She meets the deadline every single sprint without reminders.

Wasn't she meeting the deadline when you checked in?

She had met the deadline before the compliance auditors requested evidence.
She had not met the deadline by the time the announcement was published.

Meet the deadline before leaving and archive the project.
How thoroughly she had met the deadline ahead of the team!
She had been meeting the deadline for months when the project scope doubled.
She had not been meeting the deadline because key data was missing.
Had she been meeting the deadline prior to the tool migration?
Hadn't she been meeting the deadline until the supply shortage occurred?
Meet the deadline by 5 p.m. and update the dashboard.
How steadfastly she had been meeting the deadline through setbacks!
She will meet the deadline tomorrow despite the tight schedule.
She will not meet the deadline tonight if the servers keep crashing.
Will she meet the deadline once the blockers are cleared?

Meet the deadline tomorrow and finalize the assets.

Meet the deadline by Friday and circulate the summary.

She will not have been meeting the deadline all month if resource issues persist.
Will she have been meeting the deadline continuously until the audit concludes?
Won't she have been meeting the deadline for ages when the new policy kicks in?
Meet the deadline as soon as possible and log the completion.
How impressively she will have been meeting the deadline throughout the campaign!
